DescKGC.procedures.align_across_subgraphs package#

Submodules#

DescKGC.procedures.align_across_subgraphs.base module#

DescKGC.procedures.align_across_subgraphs.base.align_source_and_candidates_with_chain(topic: str, db_manager: Type[DBManager], align_chain: Type[LLMChain], align_parser: Type[BaseOutputParser], uuid: str, candidate_uuids: List[str]) → List[Tuple[int, str]][source]#

use the align_chain to align the source entity and the candidate entities.

Parameters:

  • topic (str) – The topic of the conversation

  • db_manager (DBManagerType) – The database manager

  • align_chain (Type[LLMChain]) – The align chain

  • align_parser (Type[BaseOutputParser]) – The align parser

  • uuid (str) – The uuid of the source entity

  • candidate_uuids (List[str]) – The uuids of the candidate entities

Returns:

A list of tuples, each tuple contains the order of the entity and the entity name. For example, [(0, “entity1”), (1, “entity2”)].

Return type:

List[Tuple[int, str]]

DescKGC.procedures.align_across_subgraphs.base.get_entity_type_uuids(db_manager: Type[DBManager], entity_types: list) → Dict[source]#

Return a dictionary of entity types and their uuids.

Parameters:

  • db_manager (DBManagerType) – DBManager object

  • entity_types (list) – list of entity types

Returns:

dictionary of entity types and their uuids

Return type:

Dict

DescKGC.procedures.align_across_subgraphs.base.merge_entities_with_chain(db_manager: Type[DBManager], topic: str, merge_chain: Type[LLMChain], merge_parser: Type[BaseOutputParser], uuid: str, selected_candidate_uuids: List[str]) → Tuple[str, str][source]#

use the merge_chain to merge the source entity and the candidate entities.

Parameters:

  • db_manager (DBManagerType) – The database manager

  • topic (str) – The topic of the knowledge graph

  • merge_chain (Type[LLMChain]) – The merge chain

  • merge_parser (Type[BaseOutputParser]) – The merge parser

  • uuid (str) – The uuid of the source entity

  • selected_candidate_uuids (List[str]) – The uuids of the candidate entities

Returns:

The name and description of the new entity

Return type:

Tuple[str, str]

DescKGC.procedures.align_across_subgraphs.base.query_from_specific_type_uuids(db_manager: Type[DBManager], target_entity_types: list, query_entity_uuid: str) → list[source]#

Return a list of similar entities from the target entity types.

given a query entity uuid. :param db_manager: DBManager object :type db_manager: DBManagerType :param target_entity_types: list of target entity types :type target_entity_types: list :param query_entity_uuid: uuid of the query entity :type query_entity_uuid: str :return: list of similar entities :rtype: list

DescKGC.procedures.align_across_subgraphs.base.select_candidate_entities_uuids(threshold: float, similar_entities: dict, src_entity_uuid: str) → list[source]#

Return a list of the uuids of similar entities within the threshold.

distance from the source entity. :param threshold: threshold distance :type threshold: float :param similar_entities: similar entities :type similar_entities: dict :param src_entity_uuid: uuid of the source entity :type src_entity_uuid: str :return: list of uuids of similar entities within the threshold distance :rtype: list
